whoami.title: About Me
whoami.subtitle: Maikel Carballo
whoami.about: Self-taught professional graduated from the Instituto Pedagógico de Caracas of the Universidad Pedagógica Experimental Libertador (UPEL-IPC, Venezuela) as a Computer Science Professor. I practiced the teaching career about 4 years, later I dedicated myself entirely to programming and web development. I currently work as Systems Analyst and Full Stack Web Developer at FOGADE.

cardProfile.title: Profile
cardProfile.interestsValue: VueJS, ReactJS, PWA, SPA, Full Stack Develop
